1.0.0.name: wordpress/cooleye
1.0.0.description:
This plugin adds the shortcode [coolEye] which embeds a CoolIris wall into your post or page. Many different built in search modes for YouTube, Flickr, and Picasa, including keywords, username, channel, album, favorites, and playlists. Also supports any Media RSS feed. Adds a new button to the Wordpress TinyMCE editor which brings up a modal dialog box for easily creating shortcodes.

Many Media RSS providers can be found here: http://www.cooliris.com/channels/#providers

AlJazeera, Associated Press, AlBlinkx, CBS Entertainment, CBS News, CBS Sports, CHOW, E! Online, ESPN, Failblog, Filmtrailer, FOX, Fox News, Funny or Die, FX, G4, Heyzap, Howcast, Hulu, Last.fm, LIFE, Lionsgate, Metacafe, MGM, Mochiads, MSNBC, National Geographic, NBC, PBS, People, ReelzChannel, Showtime, Sony Music, Starz, Stupid Videos, Syfy, The CW, The Insider, The New York Times, The Onion, TVGuide, USA Network, USA Today, W
